text: Machine learning is a branch of artificial intelligence that enables systems to learn from data.
Supervised learning trains models using labeled datasets to make predictions.
Unsupervised learning identifies hidden patterns in unlabeled data.
Reinforcement learning uses rewards and penalties to train intelligent agents.
Deep learning employs neural networks with many hidden layers.
Artificial neural networks are inspired by the structure of the human brain.
Convolutional neural networks are widely used in image recognition tasks.
Recurrent neural networks are effective for modeling sequential data.
Long short term memory networks address the vanishing gradient problem.
Transformers rely on self attention mechanisms for sequence modeling.
Attention mechanisms improve performance in natural language processing tasks.
Sentence embeddings represent text as dense numerical vectors.
Semantic search retrieves documents based on meaning rather than keywords.
FAISS is a library for efficient similarity search on large datasets.
Vector databases enable fast nearest neighbor search in high dimensions.
Information retrieval systems rank documents based on relevance.
TF IDF is a statistical measure used in text mining.
BERT is a transformer based model for language understanding.
Pretrained language models improve performance on downstream tasks.
Transfer learning allows reuse of learned representations.
Computer vision focuses on extracting information from images and videos.
Medical imaging applies deep learning for disease detection.
Image segmentation divides images into meaningful regions.
Object detection identifies objects within an image.
Speech recognition converts spoken language into text.
Natural language processing enables machines to understand human language.
Named entity recognition identifies entities in text data.
Text classification assigns predefined categories to documents.
Clustering groups similar data points together.
Dimensionality reduction reduces feature space complexity.
Principal component analysis is a popular dimensionality reduction technique.
Autoencoders learn compressed representations of data.
Recommendation systems suggest relevant items to users.
Collaborative filtering uses user interaction data for recommendations.
Anomaly detection identifies unusual patterns in data.
Time series analysis studies data collected over time.
Optimization algorithms minimize loss functions during training.
Gradient descent is widely used for optimization in machine learning.
Regularization prevents overfitting in models.
Dropout improves generalization in neural networks.
Evaluation metrics assess model performance.
Precision and recall are common classification metrics.
Cross validation improves reliability of model evaluation.
Big data technologies handle large scale datasets.
Cloud computing provides scalable resources for machine learning workloads.
Machine learning is a field of artificial intelligence that learns from data.
Deep learning uses neural networks with many layers.
Transformers are powerful models for NLP tasks.
Sentence embeddings are used for semantic search.
Information retrieval systems rank documents by relevance.
